sentences.en: ...brass light fittings.
sentences.cn: …黄铜灯具配件。

sentences.en: ...industrial fittings for kitchen and bathroom.
sentences.cn: …工业化生产的厨卫配件。

sentences.en: a fitting end to what was a memorable trip
sentences.cn: 一次难忘旅行的完美收尾

sentences.en: A properly fitting bra should never leave red marks.
sentences.cn: 合适的胸罩不会留下红色勒痕。

sentences.en: a sink with chrome fittings (= handle and taps )
sentences.cn: 带镀铬配件的洗涤槽

sentences.en: A solitary man, it was perhaps fitting that he should have died alone.
sentences.cn: 他是个离群索居的人，孤独地死去也许正得其所。

sentences.en: By his international achievements he leaves a fitting monument to his beliefs.
sentences.cn: 他在国际上的成就为其信念作出了最好的注解。

sentences.en: Cover the casserole with a tight-fitting lid.
sentences.cn: 用大小合适的盖子盖住砂锅。

sentences.en: Does responsibility end at the fitting of car seats?
sentences.cn: 只负责安装好汽车座椅吗？

sentences.en: He is fitting for the job.
sentences.cn: 他适合干这工作.

sentences.en: He wore an ill-fitting green corduroy suit.
sentences.cn: 他穿了件很不合身的绿色灯芯绒西装。

sentences.en: I thought the memorial was a fitting tribute to the President.
sentences.cn: 我认为这座纪念碑恰如其分地表达了对总统的敬意。

sentences.en: I'm going to a fitting tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天我要去试穿新衣.

sentences.en: It was, in fine, a fitting end to the story.
sentences.cn: 总之, 这是故事很恰当的结尾.

sentences.en: Loose-fitting shirts are comfy.
sentences.cn: 宽松的衬衫很舒服。

sentences.en: new light fittings
sentences.cn: 新款灯具配件

sentences.en: Respect the local etiquete. Modest clothing is often preferable to revealing shorts and tight-fitting tops.
sentences.cn: 要尊重当地的礼节。朴素端庄的衣着往往比暴露的短裤和紧身上衣更合适。

sentences.en: The award was a fitting tribute to her years of devoted work.
sentences.cn: 这个奖项是对她多年全心全意工作的恰如其分的褒奖。

sentences.en: There is a window fitting in a casing.
sentences.cn: 有一扇装在框内的窗.

sentences.en: Tight fitting T-shirts are making a comeback.
sentences.cn: 紧身T恤再度流行起来。

sentences.en: Wear well-fitting, lace-up shoes with soft uppers.
sentences.cn: 穿合脚的、系带的软帮鞋。

words.tran_cn: 健康的；合适的；恰当的；准备好的
合适的；订做的；有…设备的
适应（fit的过去分词）；合适；为…提供设备
安装；使……适应；使……合身；与……相符

phrases.tran_cn: 服装店的试衣室；装配车间
灯具；照明配件；装灯配件

trans.tran_cn: 适合的，适宜的，适当的，相称的
trans.tran_en: right for a particular situation or occasion

trans.tran_cn: 试穿，试衣，设备，器材，装置，装修
trans.tran_en: an outside part of a piece of equipment that makes it possible to use or handle it

trans.tran_cn: 使适合（fit的现在分词），使合身，与…相符，安装
